abstract: Raymond James plans to announce an extensive effort to help its thousands of financial advisers harness social media when contacting clients.
snippet: Raymond James plans to announce an extensive effort to help its thousands of financial advisers harness social media when contacting clients.
lead_paragraph: Judging by his Facebook page, it would seem that Jeffrey E. Blum experienced a surge of patriotic inspiration around July 4. Mr. Blum, a financial adviser, posted no fewer than 12 updates with good wishes and trivia about the holiday.

headline.main: Hear That? It’s Your Financial Adviser Tweeting.
